amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, ATF and Explosives, by $6 million and increases funding for the State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (veterans treatment courts) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Salaries and Expenses (ATF and Explosives) by $6 million and to increase funding for the State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (Veterans Treatment Courts) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
